short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display notifications for Bitbucket pull requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get notification about activities in a pull request where your role is AUTHOR, REVIEWER or PARTICIPANT.

Events:
	- new pull request assigned (REVIEWER)
	- new comment added (AUTHOR, REVIEWER, PARTICIPANT)
	- code conflicts detected (AUTHOR)
	- approved (AUTHOR)
	- flagged as "needs work" (AUTHOR)
	- removed (AUTHOR, REVIEWER)
	- merged (AUTHOR, REVIEWER)
	- declined (AUTHOR, REVIEWER)

* each event is sent only for pull requests within a specific role

Notifications:
	- browser notifications
	- slack notifications

* to enable slack notifications you need to have a simple slack app

All notifications can be disabled for a specific pull request.
